Text: Thanks for upload! This is one of the best anime's ive seen. But why there's no subs in ep 22?
but there are bonus "joke subs" in ep 23

There are 2 additional episodes not in this release.  Was annoying when I got to the end and it wasn't finished.  I repacked and added the last two episodes.  The first 25 are exactly the same and should work with new torrent.  So if you can, just grab the last 2 episodes from the new one until some seeders with more bandwidth start seeding

The new one is at http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3955948/
